data.message: Me and my boyfriend would absolutely love to not only just see but meet Ed. Tried to get tickets to his last show but they sold out far too quickly so we were gutted! It would be an amazing opportunity and if I won I'd surprise my boyfriend with the tickets because it's the day of his 18th birthday and I don't think he could ask for much more!!! Would mean so much to both of us and a great way to end the college year. Thankyou😊
